info.title: Payments API
info.description:
## MobilePay Payments API
MobilePay Payments API makes it easy
for you to collect money from your customers using MobilePay.

#### General
notes
All dates use the (`ISO 8601-1:2019`) format: date-time format - (`YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ`)
or (`YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss+00:00`).

post.description:
NameUsageTypeDescription
amountRequirednumber (integer)The amount of money to be collected by this payment.
A positive integer representing how much to charge in the smallest currency unit (e.g., 100 cents to charge €1.00). The minimum amount is 1. The maximum amount is defined by user's daily/yearly limits.
idempotencyKeyRequiredstring (uuid)A unique value that identifies this InitiatePayment request. Must be a valid GUID, and is used to protect against accidental duplicate calls. Multiple requests with the same idempotency key have the same result.
paymentPointIdRequiredstring (uuid)The Payment Point ID to associate with a payment.
redirectUriRequiredstringMobilePay will use the redirectUri URL to redirect the MobilePay user to the merchant's confirmation page once user action is completed in MobilePay app. Must be a valid URI.
referenceRequiredstringAn ID to associate with the payment. Max length: 64 characters.
You can use this field to associate the payment to an entity in an external system (for example, you might specify an order ID that is generated by your system). It is recommended to use a unique value for each payment.
descriptionOptionalstringOptional payment information to be displayed in MobilePay app to the customer. Max length: 200 characters.
This can be, for example, an invoice number, ticket number, or short description that uniquely identifies the purchase.
```json { "amount": 1250, "description": "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.", "paymentPointId": "7347ba06-95c5-4181-82e5-7c7a23609a0e", "reference": "My-Payment-1", "idempotencyKey": "fae7680f-9875-4ba9-8910-2f2e1791f390", "redirectUri": "myapp://redirect", } ```
NameUsageTypeDescription
mobilePayAppRedirectUriRequiredstringDeeplink to MobilePay app.
paymentIdRequiredstring (uuid)A unique ID for the payment.
```json { "paymentId": "186d2b31-ff25-4414-9fd1-bfe9807fa8b7", "mobilePayAppRedirectUri": "mobilepay://merchant_payments?payment_id=186d2b31-ff25-4414-9fd1-bfe9807fa8b7" } ```

application/json.message: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.

get.summary:
Gets a list of all merchant payments if no filters(e.g. stateFilter,
startDate, endDate, paymentPointId) are provided. Can also return only payments
of specific payment point if paymentPointId is provided.
get.description:
NameUsageTypeDescription
pageSizeRequirednumber (integer)The number of payments per page. The range is 1 to 1000.
paymentsRequiredarray of GetSinglePaymentResponseThe requested list of payments.
nextPageNumberOptionalnumber (integer)A number of the next page. The null value indicates that the response has the last page.
```json { "pageSize": 1, "nextPageNumber": 2, "payments": [ { "paymentId": "186d2b31-ff25-4414-9fd1-bfe9807fa8b7", "amount": 1250, "description": "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.", "paymentPointId": "7347ba06-95c5-4181-82e5-7c7a23609a0e", "reference": "My-Payment-1", "mobilePayAppRedirectUri": "mobilepay://merchant_payments?payment_id=186d2b31-ff25-4414-9fd1-bfe9807fa8b7", "state": "initiated", "initiatedOn": "2021-09-27T08:42:22Z", "lastUpdatedOn": "2021-09-27T08:42:22Z", "merchantId": "655ad36f-70b0-4add-a123-b943daca50e8", "isoCurrencyCode": "DKK", "paymentPointName": "MyPaymentPoint" } ] } ```

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description:
Default and minimum value is 1. Values that are less than 1 will
be replaced by 1.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Number of payments to be returned. Between 1 and 1000.

parameters.name: stateFilter
parameters.description:
Filter payments by state. Allowed values: "initiated", "reserved",
"captured", "cancelledByMerchant", "cancelledByUser.

payments.description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.

application/json.message: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.

get.summary: Gets a single payment by its ID.
get.description:
NameUsageTypeDescription
amountRequirednumber (integer)The amount of money to be collected by this payment.
A positive integer representing how much to charge in the smallest currency unit (e.g., 100 cents to charge €1.00). The minimum amount is 1. The maximum amount is defined by user's daily/yearly limits.
initiatedOnRequiredstring (date-time)The timestamp of when the payment was created, in ISO 8601-1:2019 format.
Examples for July 19th, 2021 12:42:38am Pacific Standard Time:
UTC: 2021-07-19T12:42:38Z
isoCurrencyCodeRequiredstringThree-letter ISO currency code, in uppercase.
Possible values:
"DKK",
"EUR"
lastUpdatedOnRequiredstring (date-time)The timestamp of when the payment was created, in ISO 8601-1:2019 format.
merchantIdRequiredstring (uuid)Merchant ID associated with the payment.
mobilePayAppRedirectUriRequiredstringDeeplink is used to redirect MobilePay users back to the merchant's app.
paymentIdRequiredstring (uuid)The ID of the payment.
paymentPointIdRequiredstring (uuid)The payment point on which payment was initiated.
paymentPointNameRequiredstringPayment point name displayed to the user in MobilePay app.
stateRequiredstringIndicates whether the payment is "initiated", "reserved", "captured", "cancelledByMerchant", "cancelledBySystem", "cancelledByUser".
descriptionOptionalstringOptional payment information to be displayed in MobilePay app to the customer. This can be, for example, an invoice number, ticket number, or short description that uniquely identifies the purchase.
referenceOptionalstringPayment's reference provided by you.
```json { "paymentId": "186d2b31-ff25-4414-9fd1-bfe9807fa8b7", "amount": 1250, "description": "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.", "paymentPointId": "7347ba06-95c5-4181-82e5-7c7a23609a0e", "reference": "My-Payment-1", "mobilePayAppRedirectUri": "mobilepay://merchant_payments?payment_id=186d2b31-ff25-4414-9fd1-bfe9807fa8b7", "state": "initiated", "initiatedOn": "2021-09-27T08:42:22Z", "lastUpdatedOn": "2021-09-27T08:42:22Z", "merchantId": "655ad36f-70b0-4add-a123-b943daca50e8", "isoCurrencyCode": "DKK", "paymentPointName": "MyPaymentPoint" } ```

application/json.description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.

post.summary: Cancel specific payment using idempotency key
post.description:
NameUsageTypeDescription
idempotencyKeyRequiredstring (uuid)The idempotency key identifying the payment to be canceled. Only payments in the initiated state can be canceled using the idempotency key.

application/json.message: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.

CancelPaymentRequest.description:
NameUsageTypeDescription
idempotencyKeyRequiredstring (uuid)The idempotency key identifying the payment to be canceled. Only payments in the initiated state can be canceled using the idempotency key.

idempotencyKey.description: The idempotency key identifying the payment to be canceled. Only payments in the initiated state can be canceled using the idempotency key.

NameUsageTypeDescription
amountRequirednumber (integer)The amount to be captured. A positive integer representing how much to capture in the smallest currency unit (e.g., 100 cents to capture €1.00). The minimum amount is 1.
